inflation: This plot shows inflation trends over time. By analyzing this graph, we can observe how various incidents over the years have impacted inflation.
GDP: GDP stands for Gross Domestic Product. This plot illustrates the yearly rate of change in GDP.
happiness: This plot reflects changes in happiness scores for Sri Lanka and Germany. The data is sourced from the World Happiness Report. The happiness score is calculated by comparing different factors, with the scale ranging from 0 to 10.
tourism: This plot represents the number of tourists visiting Sri Lanka and Germany over the years. It also calculates the percentage of tourist arrivals relative to the population of each country.
